original: 河內脩武人，曹魏官員。以躬履清蹈，進退以道而享有清譽。曾拒絕袁術徵招，最終出仕曹操。曹操對其敬重有加，命曹丕時時諮詢張範。
text: Hanoi Xiuwu, Cao Wei official. He enjoys a clear reputation for his performances, advancement and retreat. He refused Yuan Shu's recruitment and eventually became an official Cao Cao. Cao Cao respected him and ordered Cao Pi to consult Zhang Fan from time to time.
